Package fr.epitech.controller

Package for all controller operations of the MVC design-pattern

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Acceuil
    Servlet handling the Acceuil web page
    AddComment
    Servlet handling the Comment adding
    AddNews
    Servlet handling news adding
    AddProduct
    Servlet handling the product adding
    ChangeProductStock
    Servlet handling the stock changing of a product
    Connection
    Servlet handling the connexion web page
    DeleteComment
    Servlet handling the deletion of a comment
    DeleteNews
    Servlet handling the deletion of a news
    DeleteProduct
    Servlet handling the deletion of a product
    DeleteUser
    Servlet handling deletion of a user
    Disconnection
    Servlet handling the disconnection
    Inscription
    Servlet handling the registration
    Products
    Servlet handling the products web page
    ProductView
    Servlet handling the detailed view of a product
    SendMail
    Servlet handling the mail sending
    UserAccount
    Servlet handling the account view
